components.raw: V, S, M (Powdered rhubarb leaf, adder's stomach)

description: Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, the target takes 4d4 acid damage immediately and 2d4 acid damage at the end of its next turn. On miss, the arrow does half the initial damage and no extra damage.
higher_levels: Both damages increase by 1d4 for each slot level above 2nd.
name: Melf's Acid Arrow
